de.esoco.ewt.component

Class ComboBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.component.Component
      • de.esoco.ewt.component.Control
        • de.esoco.ewt.component.TextControl
          • de.esoco.ewt.component.ComboBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.DoubleClickHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.KeyDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, de.esoco.lib.property.HasId<java.lang.String>, de.esoco.lib.property.TextAttribute

    public class ComboBox
extends TextControl
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.KeyDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.DoubleClickHandler
    A combo box component that has an editable text field and a popup menu with a list of values to choose from. If an instance is initialized with the style flag StyleFlag.MULTISELECT it will allow to enter and edit multiple values which will be displayed as a list of tags. In that case the value modification methods like addValue(String) are used to modify the set of tags and getValues() to query the tags.

        public void removeValue(java.lang.String sValue)
